prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a starry body and bat-like wings.
I want a moon-themed Pokemon that has glowing accents and a majestic appearance.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that embodies the night sky with cosmic colors.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek design and a mysterious aura, inspired by lunar elements.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses psychic powers, featuring unique wing patterns and ethereal colors.
Design a Pokemon that appears to float, with a celestial theme and captivating features.
Show me a majestic bat-like creature with a beautiful blue and purple palette.
